# Zipy

## Zipy

- [Welcome to Zipy ai](https://docs.zipy.ai/welcome-to-zipy-ai): Welcome to a one stop platform which solves for customer experience.
- [Install Zipy](https://docs.zipy.ai/getting-started/install-zipy): How can I install Zipy on my product?

- [Security Overview](https://docs.zipy.ai/getting-started/security-overview): Zipy Security Overview
- [Sensitive User Data](https://docs.zipy.ai/getting-started/sensitive-user-data): How does Zipy handle sensitive user data?
- [SOC2  Type II](https://docs.zipy.ai/getting-started/soc2-type-ii): Zipy is SOC2 compliant
- [React Native Setup](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup)

- [Gesture Capturing](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/gesture-capturing): Capturing user Gestures for comprehensive interaction tracking
- [Unhandled Exception Capture](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/unhandled-exception-capture): Recording unexpected errors for comprehensive issue logging and analysis
- [Custom Logging](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/custom-logging): Recording key events and managed errors to boost app reliability and debugging efficiency
- [Fetch and XHR Network Calls](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/fetch-and-xhr-network-calls): Monitor and log Fetch and XHR network calls seamlessly with Zipy for enhanced debugging and performance optimization.
- [Profiling](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/profiling): Optimize application performance and gain deeper insights with Zipy's profiling tools.
- [Device Information Capture](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/device-information-capture): Capture device information with Zipy to optimize app performance across diverse hardware configurations.
- [Session URL Retrieval](https://docs.zipy.ai/zipy-for-mobile/react-native-setup/session-url-retrieval): Retrieve and utilize the current session URL dynamically with Zipy's getCurrentSessionUrl function.

- [Sentry](https://docs.zipy.ai/integration/sentry): Power up your Sentry exception reports with Zipy session recording URLs for quick error resolution.
- [Shopify](https://docs.zipy.ai/integration/shopify): Steps to integrate Zipy in Shopify
- [Sumo Logic](https://docs.zipy.ai/integration/sumo-logic): Use Zipy session URLs with Sumo Logic logs for efficient troubleshooting.

- [Zendesk](https://docs.zipy.ai/integration/zendesk): Improve Zendesk support using Zipy session url to resolve customer issues quickly.
